title: orula naadhukO
sahitya:
orula nAdukO valasina dEmi parama pAvana shrI rAma



anupallavi



 paritApamu tALaka moraliDagA karuNa lEka nIvE nanu jUDaga



caraNam 1



 mancivAri sahavAsamu bAsi koncEpu narula kOraku nutijEsi 

encina kAryamu gUDani gAsi sahincukuNDEDidi nA pEru vAsi

   

caraNam 2



 rAshi anucu narulanu cEbUni vAsi uNDEdi bhAvanisha priya 

nE mundu rAni jEsina karmamanu kOvale gAni

   

caraNam 3



 dEva tyAgarAja vinuta sanaka bhAvanIya raghukula tilaka 

Ivarakunu rAdu tanuvayalaka nIvE delisi kOvale gAka
